name: stack_method
definition: Stack Method: Linear Mean or Phase Weighted Stack

name: pws_timegate
definition: If ``stack_method`` ='pws', width of the smoothing (in seconds)

name: ref_begin
definition: Beginning or REF stacks. Can be absolute (2012-01-01) or relative (-100) days

name: ref_end
definition: End or REF stacks. Same as ``ref_begin``

name: mov_stack
definition: A list of two parameters: the time to "roll" over (default 1 day) and the granularity (step) of the resulting stacked CCFs (default 1 day) to stack for the Moving-window stacks. This can be a list of tuples, e.g. (('1d','1d'),('2d','1d')) corresponds to the MSNoise 1.6 "1,2" before. Time deltas can be anything pandas can interpret ("d", "min", "sec", etc).

name: wienerfilt
definition: Apply wiener filter before stacking? Y[N]

name: wiener_nlen
definition: Smoothing along lag time axis (time delta)
